name: Trixie
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: On this cherished Valentine's Day, my heart is overflowing with an abundance of love and adoration for you, my beloved. With each passing moment, my affection for you only deepens, like roots firmly entwined in the soil of my soul. Your presence brings light to even the darkest of days, and your laughter is a melody that dances through my thoughts. Today, as we celebrate love's essence, I want to express my gratitude for your unwavering support, your boundless compassion, and the way you effortlessly captivate my spirit. In your eyes, I find solace, and in your embrace, I find home. So here, with the universe as our witness, I vow to cherish and honor you with every beat of my heart. Happy Valentine's Day, my beloved. Forever and always, you are my greatest treasure.
